column4: I'm having a problem at boot ("Cannot access Hardware Clock with any know method") over Ubuntu Hoary (Kernel 2.6.11-1-amd64-k8-smp). I have seen there is a bug report on Ubuntu's bugzilla (https://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1659 [Created 2004-10-17 20:21 UTC] ) but it's still with status NEW.
